subject: Cricket (Game)
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: England won by an innings and 157 runs in cricket in Melbourne to take an unassailable 2-1 lead in the series of five five-day test matches, casting doubt on the future of the Australian captain.
snippet: England won by an innings and 157 runs in cricket in Melbourne to take an unassailable 2-1 lead in the series of five five-day test matches, casting doubt on the future of the Australian captain.
